TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Mp4Format extends Microsoft.Azure.Management.Media.Models.MultiBitrateFormat

Docs.summary: Describes the properties for an output ISO MP4 file.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string filenamePattern, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Media.Models.OutputFile> outputFiles) cil managed
Public Sub New (Optional filenamePattern As String = null, Optional outputFiles As IList(Of OutputFile) = null)

Docs.param: The pattern of the file names for the generated output files. The following macros are supported in the file name: {Basename} - The base name of the input video {Extension} - The appropriate extension for this format. {Label} - The label assigned to the codec/layer. {Index} - A unique index for thumbnails. Only applicable to thumbnails. {Bitrate} - The audio/video bitrate. Not applicable to thumbnails. {Codec} - The type of the audio/video codec. Any unsubstituted macros will be collapsed and removed from the filename.
The list of output files to produce. Each entry in the list is a set of audio and video layer labels to be muxed together .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Mp4Format class.
